pr_title: Default to zero replicas for searchable snapshots

timeline.message:
Default to zero replicas for searchable snapshots

Today a mounted searchable snapshot defaults to having the same replica
configuration as the index that was snapshotted. This commit changes this
behaviour so that we default to zero replicas on these indices, but allow the
user to override this in the mount request.

Relates #50999

timeline.bodyText: Can we capture the number of replica that it randomly set and checks once the index is mounted that it corresponds?
